iyan mama hithanne pradhana pasal warga thunak thibunama athi, palamuwanna janagahanayata samanupathikawa pihiti samanya pasal, nishchitha bhumi warga pramanayaka jiwathwana siyalu daruwanta adhyapanaya laba dima ema pasal walata barayi, dewanna suwishesha dakshatha sahitha sisunta sandaha adhi shreniye pasal, mema pasal walata tharanga wibhaga walin pamanak sisun bandawaganima sususuyi, mema pasal walata therena aarthika apahasukam athi siyallata purna shishathwa rajaya mangin labadima itha wadagath, aadishishya ho pasalata athi samipa bhawaya matha mema pasal walata sisun athulu nokalayuthyayi mama sithanawa.
